item.description:
Back in the fall, a friend and I caught their Reggae Brunch on an early Sunday afternoon, and it was really good (food and music-wise). I'm looking forward to a return trip!

 

If you're still on the waiting list when the event happens, don't worry. If this goes well, I would like to make this a monthly event, so there would be opportunities to attend down the line.

I do see a lot of people on the waiting list. You may be able to come and grab some smaller tables, depending on how full it is. The RSVP limit of 10 was just so we could reserve a table so we are all sitting together.

 

Short Video from my last visit:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rl7MxwIRIDk
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the lobby, by the comfy couches :)
item.name: Reggae Sunday Brunch!
